title: Solving Systems of Equations in Word Problems
body: As the treasurer of her daughter’s Girl Scout troop, Laney collected money for some girls and adults to go to a three-day camp. Each girl paid $75 and each adult paid $30. The total amount of money collected for camp was $765. The number of girls is three times the number of adults.
lesson: 5.5 Solve Mixture Applications with Systems of Equations
